turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good morning! Can you please order me a latte from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Definitely! Which Starbucks would you like me to order it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Douglas Street in Central Park Plaza in Omaha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm starting your order right now. Which drink would you like today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like that hot or iced?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How many calories would it be if I got whole milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right, would you like to order any other drinks today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, in that case your drink will be ready for pickup shortly at the Douglas Street Starbucks in Central Park Plaza. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.
